EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - EngineRE Migration - 2014.10.09.Email - Follow Up - Sorry We Missed Yo
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Webinar: EngineRE Migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: EngineRE Migration
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We’re sorry we missed you at our webinar about the EngineRe migration process, Tricentis’ very own, Georg Thurner, gave a short introduction of our new products and how to ensure a smooth migration process. Questions from the audience helped to make the webinar interesting and informative.
Want to see what you missed? Watch the recording here <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>.
Thanks, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
